CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 18, 1947, pg. 21, reads: "Dress Rehearsal - Clarence Jackson, Saul Codner, Ruth Schwartz and Earl Porter are shown as they went through their paces at Irene Kaufmann Settlement in preparation for their production of 'Room Service' which is currently being staged at the Settlement House by the Curtaineers. The play, written by John Murray, was presented Wednesday and will continue Thursday, Friday, and Saturday of this week. The Curtaineers are dedicated to the best in dramatic arts and to the cause of democratic understanding. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors Clarence Jackson, Saul Codner, Ruth Schwartz and Earl Porter enacting bed scene from "Room Service" play presented by the Curtaineers, at Irene Kaufmann Settlement House
